level.text: Suppliers shall be prohibited from engaging in activities relating to the sale of bingo equipment in accordance with D.C. Official Code ยง 3-1329.
During the term of the license, suppliers of Monte Carlo night party equipment shall not do the following:
Sell, rent, or distribute equipment and supplies to any person or organization other than a licensed organization;
Sell, rent, or distribute equipment at prices other than the prices on file with the Board;
Sell, rent, or distribute equipment which is not registered with the Board;

Be present to transact business during a Monte Carlo night party, unless that supplier has a written contract approved by the Board to operate a Monte Carlo Night party for a licensed organization; and
Assign or transfer its license to any other party.
